languages.text:
Cyber Eagle has +20 Perception, and +300% Damage and deals 25% additional Critical Damage against targets with Bleeding.
At the end of Overseer's turn their Cyber Eagle attacks {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy with additional effect:
- If {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy hit by Cyber Eagle attack has 100% Wounds, they must succeed at Toughness or gain Bleeding {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}.
- If {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy hit by Cyber Eagle attack has 50% or less Wounds, this attack gains +50% Critical Hit Chance.
- If {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy hit by Cyber Eagle attack was hit by Overseer this round, this attack gains +20% Critical Damage.

traits.locale_text:
Cyber Eagle has +20 Perception, and +300% Damage and deals 25% additional Critical Damage against targets with Bleeding.
At the end of Overseer's turn their Cyber Eagle attacks {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy with additional effect:
- If {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy hit by Cyber Eagle attack has 100% Wounds, they must succeed at Toughness or gain Bleeding {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}.
- If {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy hit by Cyber Eagle attack has 50% or less Wounds, this attack gains +50% Critical Hit Chance.
- If {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy hit by Cyber Eagle attack was hit by Overseer this round, this attack gains +20% Critical Damage.

languages.text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +300% damage.
Its {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} targets is increased by +25%. When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} ends, the cyber-eagle attacks the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy. This attack has the following possible effects:
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy has 100% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} before that attack, they must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} levels of bleeding.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy has 50% or less wounds before that attack, the attack gains +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy was hit by the Overseer this round, the cyber-eagle's attack gains +20% critical damage.</indent>

languages.text:
Siber kartal, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} niteliği kazanır ve +%300 daha fazla hasar verir.
{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Kan kaybeden{/g} hedeflere verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik hasar{/g}, +%25 artar. Siber kartal, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen'in{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sona erdiğinde {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenen{/g} düşmana saldırır. Bu saldırının şu olası etkileri bulunur:
-<indent=5%>{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Engellenen{/g} düşmanın saldırıdan önceki {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı %100 ise bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} seviye kazanamaya maruz kalır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Engellenen{/g} düşmanın saldırıdan önceki sağlık puanı %50 veya altındaysa saldırının kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} +%50 artar.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Engellenen{/g} düşman, o rauntta Gözetmen tarafından vurulursa siber kartalın saldırısı +%20 kritik hasar kazanır.</indent>

-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy has 50% or less wounds before that attack, the attack gains +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy was hit by the Overseer this round, the cyber-eagle's attack gains +20% critical damage.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Siber kartal, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} niteliği kazanır ve +%300 daha fazla hasar verir.
{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Kan kaybeden{/g} hedeflere verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik hasar{/g}, +%25 artar. Siber kartal, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen'in{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sona erdiğinde {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenen{/g} düşmana saldırır. Bu saldırının şu olası etkileri bulunur:
-<indent=5%>{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Engellenen{/g} düşmanın saldırıdan önceki {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı %100 ise bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} seviye kazanamaya maruz kalır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Engellenen{/g} düşmanın saldırıdan önceki sağlık puanı %50 veya altındaysa saldırının kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} +%50 artar.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Engellenen{/g} düşman, o rauntta Gözetmen tarafından vurulursa siber kartalın saldırısı +%20 kritik hasar kazanır.</indent>

Siber kartal, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} niteliği kazanır ve +%300 daha fazla hasar verir.
{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Kan kaybeden{/g} hedeflere yaptığı {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşlar{/g}, +%25 ilave hasar verir. {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Turu{/g} başladığında siber kartal, {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenen{/g} düşmana saldırır. Bu saldırının şu olası etkileri bulunur:
-<indent=5%>{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Engellenen{/g} düşmanın saldırıdan önceki {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık puanı{/g} %100 ise bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} seviye kazanamaya maruz kalır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Engellenen{/g} düşmanın saldırıdan önceki sağlık puanı %50 veya altındaysa saldırının kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} +%50 artar.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}Engellenen{/g} düşman, o rauntta Gözetmen tarafından vurulursa siber kartalın saldırısı +%20 kritik hasar kazanır.</indent>

languages.text:
La ciberáguila recibe +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} e inflige un +300 % de daño adicional.
El {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} contra objetivos que sufran {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} aumenta un +25 %. Al final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}, la ciberáguila ataca al enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g}. Este ataque tiene los siguientes efectos posibles:
-<indent=5%>Si el enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} tenía el 100 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} antes del ataque, debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} para no sufrir {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} niveles de hemorragia.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si el enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} tenía el 50 % o menos de sus heridas antes del ataque, el ataque gana un +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si el enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} ya había sufrido algún impacto del supervisor en el mismo asalto, el ataque de la ciberáguila inflige un +20 % de daño crítico.</indent>

The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +300% damage.
Its {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} targets is increased by +25%. When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} ends, the cyber-eagle attacks the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy. This attack has the following possible effects:
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy has 100% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} before that attack, they must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} levels of bleeding.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy has 50% or less wounds before that attack, the attack gains +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy was hit by the Overseer this round, the cyber-eagle's attack gains +20% critical damage.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
La ciberáguila recibe +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} e inflige un +300 % de daño adicional.
El {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} contra objetivos que sufran {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} aumenta un +25 %. Al final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}, la ciberáguila ataca al enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g}. Este ataque tiene los siguientes efectos posibles:
-<indent=5%>Si el enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} tenía el 100 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} antes del ataque, debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} para no sufrir {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} niveles de hemorragia.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si el enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} tenía el 50 % o menos de sus heridas antes del ataque, el ataque gana un +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si el enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} ya había sufrido algún impacto del supervisor en el mismo asalto, el ataque de la ciberáguila inflige un +20 % de daño crítico.</indent>

La ciberáguila recibe +20 de Percepción e inflige un +300 % de daño adicional.
Sus impactos críticos contra objetivos que sufran hemorragia infligen un +25 % de daño adicional. Al comienzo de su turno, la ciberáguila ataca al enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g}. Este ataque tiene los siguientes efectos posibles:
-<indent=5%>Si el enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} tenía el 100 % de sus heridas antes del ataque, debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia para no sufrir {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} niveles de hemorragia.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si el enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} tenía el 50 % o menos de sus heridas antes del ataque, el ataque gana un +50 % de probabilidad de impacto crítico.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si el enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} ha sido golpeado previamente por el supervisor en el mismo asalto, el ataque de la ciberáguila inflige un +20 % de daño crítico.</indent>

La ciberáguila recibe +20 de Percepción e inflige un +300 % de daño adicional.
Sus impactos críticos contra objetivos que sufran hemorragia infligen un +25 % de daño adicional. Al comienzo de su turno, la ciberáguila ataca al enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g}. Este ataque tiene los siguientes efectos posibles:
-<indent=5%>Si el enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} tenía el 100 % de sus heridas antes del ataque, debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia para no sufrir {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} niveles de hemorragia.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si el enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} tenía el 50 % o menos de sus heridas antes del ataque, el ataque gana un +50 % de probabilidad de impacto crítico.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si el enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g} ha sido golpeado previamente por el supervisor en el mismo asalto, el ataque de la ciberáguila inflige un +20 % de daño crítico.</indent>

languages.text:
生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}提高20点，造成的伤害提高300%。
生化猎鹰对{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态的敌人造成暴击时，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高25%。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，生化猎鹰会攻击{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人，此次攻击可能会产生以下效果：
- <indent=5%>如果{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}为100%，则需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会获得{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}级流血效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>如果{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人生命值不超过50%，则生化猎鹰此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高50%。</indent>
- <indent=5%>如果{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人在本轮中曾被监察官命中过，则生化猎鹰此次攻击的暴击伤害提高20%。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +300% damage.
Its {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} targets is increased by +25%. When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} ends, the cyber-eagle attacks the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy. This attack has the following possible effects:
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy has 100% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} before that attack, they must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} levels of bleeding.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy has 50% or less wounds before that attack, the attack gains +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy was hit by the Overseer this round, the cyber-eagle's attack gains +20% critical damage.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}提高20点，造成的伤害提高300%。
生化猎鹰对{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态的敌人造成暴击时，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高25%。监察官的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，生化猎鹰会攻击{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人，此次攻击可能会产生以下效果：
- <indent=5%>如果{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}为100%，则需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会获得{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}级流血效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>如果{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人生命值不超过50%，则生化猎鹰此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高50%。</indent>
- <indent=5%>如果{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人在本轮中曾被监察官命中过，则生化猎鹰此次攻击的暴击伤害提高20%。</indent>

生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}提高20点，造成的伤害提高300%。
生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}命中处于{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态的敌人时，额外造成25%伤害。生化猎鹰在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，会攻击{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人，此次攻击可能会产生以下效果。
- <indent=5%>如果{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}为100%，则需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会获得{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}级流血效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>如果{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人生命值不超过50%，则生化猎鹰此次攻击的暴击率提高50%。</indent>
- <indent=5%>如果{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人在本轮中曾被监察官{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}过，则生化猎鹰此次攻击的暴击伤害提高20%。</indent>

生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}提高20点，造成的伤害提高300%。
生化猎鹰对{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态的敌人造成暴击时，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高25%。生化猎鹰在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，会攻击{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人，此次攻击可能会产生以下效果。
- <indent=5%>如果{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}为100%，则需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会获得{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}级流血效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>如果{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人生命值不超过50%，则生化猎鹰此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高50%。</indent>
- <indent=5%>如果{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人在本轮中曾被监察官命中过，则生化猎鹰此次攻击的暴击伤害提高20%。</indent>

生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}提高20点，造成的伤害提高300%。
生化猎鹰对{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态的敌人造成暴击时，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高25%。监察官的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，生化猎鹰会攻击{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人，此次攻击可能会产生以下效果：
- <indent=5%>如果{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}为100%，则需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性检定，若未能通过检定，则会获得{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}级流血效果。</indent>

- <indent=5%>如果{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人在本轮中曾被监察官命中过，则生化猎鹰此次攻击的暴击伤害提高20%。</indent>

languages.text:
Der Cyber-Adler erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und verursacht +300 % Schaden.
Sein {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Schaden{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}blutende{/g} Ziele erhöht sich um +25 %. Am Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} attackiert der Cyber-Adler den {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmten{/g} Gegner. Dieser Angriff kann folgende Effekte haben.
-<indent=5%>Hat der {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmte{/g} Gegner vor diesem Angriff 100 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, muss er eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} bestehen, um nicht mit {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} Blutung-Stufen belegt zu werden.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Hat der {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmte{/g} Gegner vor dem Angriff 50 % oder weniger Wunden, hat der Angriff +50 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Wurde der {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmte{/g} Gegner in dieser Runde vom Aufseher getroffen, greift der Cyber-Adler erneut an und verursacht +20 % kritischen Schaden.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +300% damage.
Its {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} targets is increased by +25%. When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} ends, the cyber-eagle attacks the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy. This attack has the following possible effects:
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy has 100% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} before that attack, they must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} levels of bleeding.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy has 50% or less wounds before that attack, the attack gains +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy was hit by the Overseer this round, the cyber-eagle's attack gains +20% critical damage.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Der Cyber-Adler erhält +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und verursacht +300 % Schaden.
Sein {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Schaden{/g} gegen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}blutende{/g} Ziele erhöht sich um +25 %. Am Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} attackiert der Cyber-Adler den {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmten{/g} Gegner. Dieser Angriff kann folgende Effekte haben.
-<indent=5%>Hat der {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmte{/g} Gegner vor diesem Angriff 100 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, muss er eine Widerstandsprobe auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} bestehen, um nicht mit {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|zusätzlichen} Blutung-Stufen belegt zu werden.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Hat der {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmte{/g} Gegner vor dem Angriff 50 % oder weniger Wunden, hat der Angriff +50 % kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Wurde der {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehemmte{/g} Gegner in dieser Runde vom Aufseher getroffen, greift der Cyber-Adler erneut an und verursacht +20 % kritischen Schaden.</indent>

languages.text:
Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de +20 et inflige +300 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Ses {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} infligés à des cibles subissant un {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} sont augmentés de 25 %. À la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}, le cyber-aigle attaque l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g}. Cette attaque peut avoir les effets suivants :
-<indent=5%>Si l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} bénéficie de 100 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} avant l'attaque, il doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. En cas d'échec, il subit {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} niveaux de Saignement.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} bénéficie de 50 % ou moins de ses blessures, l'attaque gagne +50 % aux {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} a été touché par le surveillant au cours de ce round, l'attaque du cyber-aigle inflige +20 % de dégâts critiques supplémentaires.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +300% damage.
Its {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} targets is increased by +25%. When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} ends, the cyber-eagle attacks the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy. This attack has the following possible effects:
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy has 100% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} before that attack, they must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} levels of bleeding.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy has 50% or less wounds before that attack, the attack gains +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy was hit by the Overseer this round, the cyber-eagle's attack gains +20% critical damage.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de +20 et inflige +300 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Ses {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} infligés à des cibles subissant un {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} sont augmentés de 25 %. À la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du surveillant, le cyber-aigle attaque l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g}. Cette attaque peut avoir les effets suivants :
-<indent=5%>Si l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} bénéficie de 100 % de ses blessures avant l'attaque, il doit réussir un test de résistance d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. En cas d'échec, il subit {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} niveaux de Saignement.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} bénéficie de 50 % ou moins de ses blessures, l'attaque gagne +50 % aux {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} a été touché par le surveillant au cours de ce round, l'attaque du cyber-aigle inflige +20 % de dégâts critiques supplémentaires.</indent>

Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de +20 et inflige +300 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coups critiques{/g} qu'il inflige aux cibles sous l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} infligent +25 % de dégâts supplémentaires. Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du cyber-aigle, il attaque l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g}. Cette attaque peut avoir les effets suivants.
-<indent=5%>Si l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} bénéficie de 100 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} avant l'attaque, il doit réussir un test de résistance d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. En cas d'échec, il subit {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} niveaux de Saignement.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} bénéficie de 50 % ou moins de ses blessures, l'attaque gagne +50 % aux {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup{/g} critique.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} a été touché par le surveillant au cours de ce round, l'attaque du cyber-aigle inflige +20 % de dégâts critiques supplémentaires.</indent>

Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de +20 et inflige +300 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Ces {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} infligés à des cibles subissant un {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} sont augmentés de 25 %. Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du cyber-aigle, il attaque l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g}. Cette attaque peut avoir les effets suivants.
-<indent=5%>Si l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} bénéficie de 100 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} avant l'attaque, il doit réussir un test de résistance d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. En cas d'échec, il subit {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} niveaux de Saignement.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} bénéficie de 50 % ou moins de ses blessures, l'attaque gagne +50 % aux {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} a été touché par le surveillant au cours de ce round, l'attaque du cyber-aigle inflige +20 % de dégâts critiques supplémentaires.</indent>

Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de +20 et inflige +300 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Ces {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} infligés à des cibles subissant un {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} sont augmentés de 25 %. Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du cyber-aigle, il attaque l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g}. Cette attaque peut avoir les effets suivants.
-<indent=5%>Si l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} bénéficie de 100 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} avant l'attaque, il doit réussir un test de résistance d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}. En cas d'échec, il subit {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} niveaux de Saignement.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} bénéficie de 50 % ou moins de ses blessures, l'attaque gagne +50 % aux {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Si l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g} a été touché par le surveillant au cours de ce round, l'attaque du cyber-aigle inflige +20 % de dégâts critiques supplémentaires.</indent>

languages.text:
サイバーイーグルの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}+20され、与えるダメージが+300%上昇する。
{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}状態のターゲットに対する{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}は+25%の追加ダメージを与える。{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終了すると同時に、サイバーイーグルは{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵を攻撃する。この攻撃では以下の効果が発生する可能性がある。
-<indent=5%>{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵の攻撃前の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が100%の場合、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}レベルの出血となる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵の攻撃前の傷が50%以下の場合、その攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}率が+50%上昇する。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵が、このラウンドで監督者によって攻撃された場合、サイバーイーグルのクリティカルダメージが+20%上昇する。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +300% damage.
Its {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} targets is increased by +25%. When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} ends, the cyber-eagle attacks the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy. This attack has the following possible effects:
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy has 100% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} before that attack, they must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} levels of bleeding.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy has 50% or less wounds before that attack, the attack gains +50% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>If the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy was hit by the Overseer this round, the cyber-eagle's attack gains +20% critical damage.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
サイバーイーグルの認知力+20され、与えるダメージが+300%上昇する。
出血状態のターゲットに対するクリティカルヒットは+25%の追加ダメージを与える。サイバーイーグルのターン開始時、{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵を攻撃する。この攻撃では以下の効果が発生する可能性がある。
-<indent=5%>{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵の攻撃前の傷が100%の場合、耐久力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}レベルの出血となる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵の攻撃前の傷が50%以下の場合、その攻撃のクリティカルヒット率が+50%上昇する。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵が、このラウンドで監督者によって攻撃された場合、サイバーイーグルのクリティカルダメージが+20%上昇する。</indent>
